nodes.text: The JR-4 swoop was a model of swoop. The CK-6 swoop bike manufactured by Bespin Motors was essentially a militarized version of the JR-4 swoop.

The JR-4 swoop was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to the roleplaying games produced by Fantasy Flight Games. The swoop originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the Arms & Equipment Guide, a 2002 supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game produced by Wizards of the Coast.
